articles.title: Elon Musk Pivots From DOGE to SpaceX Mars Plan, Eyeing Self-Sustaining Colony by 2029
articles.description: After exiting DOGE, Musk renews his focus on SpaceX and Mars, calling colonization key to humanity’s survival.
articles.content:
In brief Elon Musk outlined a bold plan to colonize Mars, targeting a self-sustaining colony by the end of the decade.
Musk’s plan includes building 1,000 Starships a year to support large-scale Mars transport.
Reusable rockets and orbital refueling ... [4650 chars]
